kv4.8:1.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?

kv4.8:4.5.pli: Hañci bhagavā sayambhū, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.8:5.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?

kv4.8:5.3.pli: Bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle tīṇeva sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?

kv4.8:6.1.pli: Nanu bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?

kv4.8:6.3.pli: Hañci bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhāni, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.8:7.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?

kv4.8:8.1.pli: Bodhisatto aparantapaṃ akāsi, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddisīti?

kv4.8:9.1.pli: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, āyasmā ānando bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:9.3.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:10.1.pli: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:10.3.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:11.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:11.3.pli: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:12.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:12.3.pli: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:13.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?

kv4.8:14.5.pli: “kassape ahaṃ, ānanda, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ acariṃ āyatiṃ sambodhāyā”ti.

kv4.8:15.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?

kv4.8:20.1.pli: “Yathā kho tvaṃ, āvuso, paṭijānāsi, arahasi anantajino”ti?

kv4.8:23.1.pli: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?

kv4.8:23.4.pli: “‘idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.

kv4.8:23.5.pli: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

kv4.8:23.6.pli: pariññātanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi …pe… āloko udapādi.

kv4.8:23.8.pli: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

kv4.8:23.11.pli: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

kv4.8:23.14.pli: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…

kv4.8:23.15.pli: bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.

kv4.9:1.1.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:1.3.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo catūhi phassehi catūhi vedanāhi catūhi saññāhi catūhi cetanāhi catūhi cittehi catūhi saddhāhi catūhi vīriyehi catūhi satīhi catūhi samādhīhi catūhi paññāhi samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:2.1.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:2.3.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi phassehi tīhi vedanāhi …pe…

kv4.9:3.3.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi phassehi dvīhi vedanāhi …pe…

kv4.9:4.3.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpanno sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījīti?

kv4.9:6.3.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmī antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?

kv4.9:7.3.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpanno sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījīti?

kv4.9:9.3.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpanno sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījīti?

kv4.9:10.5.pli: Sveva arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sotāpannoti?

kv4.9:11.5.pli: Sveva arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sakadāgāmīti?

kv4.9:12.5.pli: Sveva arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so anāgāmīti?

kv4.9:13.5.pli: Sveva anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sotāpannoti?

kv4.9:14.5.pli: Sveva anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sakadāgāmīti?

kv4.9:15.5.pli: Sveva sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sotāpannoti?

kv4.9:16.3.pli: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivattoti?

kv4.9:16.5.pli: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:17.1.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:17.3.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattimaggaṃ vītivatto, sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ vicikicchaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ apāyagamanīyaṃ rāgaṃ apāyagamanīyaṃ dosaṃ apāyagamanīyaṃ mohaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:18.3.pli: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vītivattoti?

kv4.9:18.5.pli: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:19.1.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:19.3.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmimaggaṃ vītivatto, oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:20.3.pli: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalaṃ vītivattoti?

kv4.9:20.5.pli: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalaṃ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:21.1.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:21.3.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmimaggaṃ vītivatto, aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:22.3.pli: Nanu anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivattoti?

kv4.9:22.5.pli: Hañci anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:23.1.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:23.3.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattimaggaṃ vītivatto, sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ …pe…

kv4.9:24.3.pli: Nanu anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vītivattoti?

kv4.9:24.5.pli: Hañci anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:25.1.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:25.3.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmimaggaṃ vītivatto, oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:26.3.pli: Nanu sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivattoti?

kv4.9:26.5.pli: Hañci sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:27.1.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:27.3.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattimaggaṃ vītivatto, sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ …pe…

kv4.9:28.4.pli: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tīṇi phalāni paṭiladdhāni, tehi ca aparihīnoti?

kv4.9:28.6.pli: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tīṇi phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīno, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:29.4.pli: Nanu anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve phalāni paṭiladdhāni, tehi ca aparihīnoti?

kv4.9:29.6.pli: Hañci anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīno, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:30.4.pli: Nanu sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena sotāpattiphalaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ, tena ca aparihīnoti?

kv4.9:30.6.pli: Hañci sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena sotāpattiphalaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ tena ca aparihīno, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv4.9:31.1.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tīṇi phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīnoti, arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:31.3.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā tehi ca aparihīnoti, arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo catūhi maggehi samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:32.1.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīnoti, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:32.3.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tayo maggā paṭiladdhā tehi ca aparihīnoti, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi maggehi samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:33.1.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena sotāpattiphalaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ tena ca aparihīnoti, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalena samannāgatoti?

kv4.9:33.3.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve maggā paṭiladdhā tehi ca aparihīnoti, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi maggehi samannāgatoti?

kv5.1:1.3.pli: Yaṃ kiñci vimuttiñāṇaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ vimuttanti?

kv5.1:2.7.pli: Sotāpannassa ñāṇaṃ, sotāpattiphalaṃ pattassa paṭiladdhassa adhigatassa sacchikatassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:2.11.pli: Sakadāgāmissa ñāṇaṃ, sakadāgāmiphalaṃ pattassa paṭiladdhassa adhigatassa sacchikatassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:2.15.pli: Anāgāmissa ñāṇaṃ, anāgāmiphalaṃ pattassa paṭiladdhassa adhigatassa sacchikatassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:2.19.pli: Arahato ñāṇaṃ, arahattaṃ pattassa paṭiladdhassa adhigatassa sacchikatassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalasamaṅgissa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.3.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.5.pli: sakadāgāmiphalasamaṅgissa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.7.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.9.pli: anāgāmiphalasamaṅgissa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.11.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.13.pli: arahattaphalasamaṅgissa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.1:4.15.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttantaṃ ca phalaṃ pattassa ñāṇanti?

kv5.10:3.3.pli: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññattīti?

kv5.10:4.3.pli: Sāvako jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?

kv5.10:5.3.pli: Sāvako anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?

kv5.10:6.6.pli: tena hi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṃ atthīti …pe….

kv5.10:7.1.pli: Vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttaṃ, sekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ, viparīte ñāṇaṃ, aniyatassa niyāmagamanāya atthi ñāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidāti, sammutiñāṇaṃ, cetopariyāye ñāṇaṃ, anāgate ñāṇaṃ, paṭuppanne ñāṇaṃ, sāvakassa phale ñāṇanti.

kv5.10:8.1.pli: Sattupaladdhiṃ, upaharato, balaṃ, gihi’ssa arahā ca, vimuttipañcamanti.

kv5.2:1.3.pli: Sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti passati, diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv5.2:1.5.pli: nanu sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv5.2:1.7.pli: Hañci sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharati, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv5.2:2.1.pli: Asekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, asekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti passati, diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv5.2:2.3.pli: Sekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti passati, diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv5.2:3.1.pli: Sekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, sekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv5.2:3.3.pli: Asekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, asekho asekhaṃ dhammaṃ na jānāti na passati, adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ na upasampajja viharati, na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv5.2:4.5.pli: sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa sotāpattiphale ñāṇaṃ atthīti?

kv5.2:4.7.pli: sakadāgāmiphala … anāgāmiphala … arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa puggalassa arahatte ñāṇaṃ atthīti?

kv5.2:5.4.pli: Nanu āyasmā ānando sekho—“bhagavā uḷāro”ti jānāti, “sāriputto thero, mahāmoggallāno thero uḷāro”ti jānātīti?

kv5.2:5.6.pli: Hañci āyasmā ānando sekho—“bhagavā uḷāro”ti jānāti, “sāriputto thero, mahāmoggallāno thero uḷāro”ti jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv5.3:2.7.pli: Hañci kusalaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv5.3:3.1.pli: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?

kv5.3:3.3.pli: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?

kv5.3:3.7.pli: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?

kv5.3:3.9.pli: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?

kv5.3:4.1.pli: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?

kv5.3:4.3.pli: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?

kv5.3:4.5.pli: pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, tañca akusalanti?

kv5.3:4.9.pli: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?

kv5.3:5.5.pli: Hañci arahā pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv5.3:6.1.pli: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṃ, arahā pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjeyyāti?

kv5.3:8.3.pli: Hañci natthi arahato saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv5.3:9.6.pli: Tena hi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇanti.

kv5.3:10.3.pli: Nanu pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjatīti?

kv5.3:10.5.pli: Hañci pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv5.3:11.1.pli: Pathavī atthi, pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjantassa viparītaṃ hotīti?

kv5.3:11.3.pli: Nibbānaṃ atthi, nibbānaṃ nibbānato samāpajjantassa viparītaṃ hotīti?
